citations.narrative:
Three small rabbits were housed in a cage providing only 4 sq. ft. of floor space. Three rabbits this size require at
least 4.5 sq. ft. of space. Need to provide the required floor space to ensure adequate freedom of movement.
Correct by September 13, 2014.
Exit briefing conducted with licensee.
